body:
@apaszke No, someone said maybe because the saved model is in pytorch python2 and now I am using pytorch in python 3. Sorry I just find that it trained in different computer. So can we convert the model?
I am sorry I just see the sugesstion in [here](https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/unicodedecodeerror-ascii-codec-cant-decode-byte-0xc3-in-position-918-ordinal-not-in-range-128/15356/2)
